title: n173 Old Judge Cabinet, Denny Lyons, SGC 50  SOLD
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: n173 Old Judge Cabinet, Denny Lyons, SGC 50  SOLD
posts.post_content:
After simply inviting inquiries, I have now set a price for this, rather than keep responding to PMs.   Hard to figure the value for only one graded, and this one has unusually good grade for these, and also unusually good centering.   But I am setting it at $1800--firm.  The  back is fine and I will provide scan if you want.   Thanks. 

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=225625&stc=1&d=1459036819[/url][url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=227770&stc=1&d=1460583572[/url]
Bump for set price added now.

posts.post_title: Re: n173 Old Judge Cabinet, Denny Lyons, SGC 50, Only One Graded

posts.post_content: Wow that's actually the first non preview image OJ cabinent I've ever seen - and my word it is glorious. I feel like I should get on my knees here. (this is a prayer reference - for clarity)
